paper.title: Iterative Methods for the Analysis of Petri Nets
paper.venue: Selected Papers from the First and the Second European Workshop on Application and Theory of Petri Nets
paper.abstract: The aim of this paper is to show how the iterative methods for the analysis of discrete systems presented in [1][2][3] can be applied to Petri nets and their extensions. The results given in this paper have been obtained by direct application of those exposed in the references.
